lead_paragraph: After publicly backing away from his proposed tax cut for small businesses, Donald J. Trump’s campaign aides told a small-business group that he still supported the plan.

headline.print_headline: Is Trump’s Trillion-Dollar Tax Cut On or Off? It Depends on the Audience
headline.main: Conflicting Policy From Trump: To Keep, and Remove, Tax Cut

snippet: After publicly backing away from his proposed tax cut for small businesses, Donald J. Trump’s campaign aides told a small-business group that he still supported the plan....
abstract: Donald Trump's campaign staffers have told some groups his proposal for $1 trillion tax cut for small businesses is still in place, while telling others Trump has decided to eliminate it; conflicting accounts come even after Trump's advisers have taken months to refine details of his tax plan, although strategy of having two versions of his tax policy has redounded to his benefit.
